name: Drum Live
description:
Drum Live: the best drums app. This app will help you learn drums to become real drummer.

With 4000+ drums lessons for you to learn how to play.
This virtual drum games lets you play on the drum kit with drums sticks right along with a pianist, guitarist and even a singer. Just tap and instantly hear the kick drums, cymbals, or snare drums! Excellent for anyone who wants study or play the drums, without making too much noise or taking up too much space.

Drums Live app let's you play on a real drum kit and learn thousands songs in no time! You did not think playing music was that easy right?

Drum Live has multiple classic drum kits that consist of bass, snare, tom-tom drums and percussions like hi-hat, crash, ride, cowbell cymbals...

Check out the details of the Drum Live:
- 4000+ lessons to learning
- 1000+ song to become real drummer
- 13 drum pads
- High-fidelity drum sounds
- Recording mode

More highlights:
- Jazz kit
- Rock kit
- Dance kit
- Electric Pad
- Ethnic drums
- Chinese Drum

Drum Live Vip
Drum Live Vip Subscription allows you to unlock all songs, features and remove ads.

Choose from different subscription options. Our standard subscription options are:
- 1 week subscription with 3-day free trial
- 1 month subscription
- 1 year subscription

* Subscription with a free trial period will automatically renew and convert to a paid subscription.
* Please note: any unused portion of a free trial period (if offered) will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period.

* You can cancel a free trial or subscription anytime by canceling your subscription through your iTunes account settings. This must be done 24 hours before the end of a free trial or subscription period to avoid being charged. The cancelation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period, and you will be downgraded to the free service.

EULA: http://sensornotes.com/termsofservice.html
Privacy Policy: http://sensornotes.com/policy.html
